queries.query_description: Ensures clean state by removing any leftover objects from previous failed runs

queries.query_string: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS data_insert_test (id INT SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, category VARCHAR(50), amount DECIMAL(10,2), status VARCHAR(20), data TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, INDEX idx_category (category), INDEX idx_status (status))
queries.query_description: Creates table for INSERT anomaly testing with multiple columns and indexes

queries.query_string: INSERT INTO data_insert_test (category, amount, status, data) VALUES ('Category_A', ROUND(RANDOM() * 1000, 2), 'active', CONCAT('Baseline Hour 1 - ', gen_random_uuid()::text))
queries.query_description: Hour 1 baseline - 50 INSERT operations with varied data

queries.query_string: INSERT INTO data_insert_test (category, amount, status, data) VALUES ('Category_B', ROUND(RANDOM() * 2000, 2), 'pending', CONCAT('Baseline Hour 2 - ', gen_random_uuid()::text))
queries.query_description: Hour 2 baseline - 50 INSERT operations with varied data

queries.query_string: INSERT INTO data_insert_test (category, amount, status, data) VALUES ('Category_C', ROUND(RANDOM() * 1500, 2), 'active', CONCAT('Baseline Hour 3 - ', gen_random_uuid()::text))
queries.query_description: Hour 3 baseline - 50 INSERT operations with varied data

queries.query_string: INSERT INTO data_insert_test (category, amount, status, data) VALUES ('Category_D', ROUND(RANDOM() * 2500, 2), 'completed', CONCAT('Baseline Hour 4 - ', gen_random_uuid()::text))
queries.query_description: Hour 4 baseline - 50 INSERT operations with varied data

queries.query_string: INSERT INTO data_insert_test (category, amount, status, data) VALUES (CONCAT('Spike_', FLOOR(RANDOM() * 10)), ROUND(RANDOM() * 5000, 2), 'anomaly', CONCAT('SPIKE INSERT - Potential data injection - ', gen_random_uuid()::text))
queries.query_description: HOUR 5 ANOMALY: 1000 rapid INSERT operations - 20x normal rate indicating potential data injection attack

queries.query_string: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_records, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'anomaly' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as spike_records, SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('active', 'pending', 'completed') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as baseline_records FROM data_insert_test
queries.query_description: Verify total records inserted and categorize by type
